products.title: LA LAGARTIJA
products.description: Mysterious and treacherous... The best choice for the start of your journey! It will provide you a rich delicious flavour.

products.title: EL TIGRE
products.description: Really dark coffee, only for the real gourments. It has bitter flavor of grapefruit and is mixed with a little bit of peanuts with caramel

products.title: LA CUCARACHA
products.description: Sweet and intense with a big amount of different flavors. Caramel, grapes, strawberry, you name it! It's great choice for warm summer days
